data.name: Regional Scrum Gathering 2019
data.description: Agile Nepal is an Open Agile Community that provides an opportunity to Agile coaches, practitioners, followers, enthusiasts, and learners who would like to connect, discuss, learn and share their own experiences adopting or implementing Agile in their organizations.

relatedRecords.name: Web Weekend Kathmandu
relatedRecords.description: wwktm is an effort to gather experts, both national and international, and create an environment for new partnerships, collaborations and learning groups to be formed. We want to create a space that encourages participation and then the dynamics of the group will take over the direction.

relatedRecords.name: Greachconf
relatedRecords.description: Greach is a conference about Android, JVM frameworks (Micronaut, Grails...), and JVM Languages (Groovy, Kotlin) at Madrid during the 28th, 29th and 30th of March, 2019.
